message: Regina, I'm offering you my product at a price of $1200000.  This is a significant investment, but I believe it will be very valuable to your company.  Let me know your thoughts!
Thank you for your initial offer, Alice. I understand the product's value, but my budget is limited. I can offer $850,000 for the product. I hope we can reach an agreement at this price

Regina, I appreciate your offer, but it's below my minimum acceptable price.  I'm willing to come down to $1050000 for the product. This reflects the value it will bring to your company and gives you a good price. Let's see if we can find common ground.
